Name: HMS Eagle
Propulsion:
4 shafts
4 geared steam turbine sets
32 water-tube boilers
Range: 4,800 nmi (8,900 km; 5,500 mi) at 16 knots (30 km/h; 18 mph)
Armament:
9 × 6-inch (152 mm) guns
5 × 4-inch (102 mm) Mk V anti-aircraft guns
Armour:
Belt: 4.5 in (114 mm)
Deck: 1–1.5 in (25–38 mm)
Bulkheads: 4 in (102 mm)
